text: Twelfth Night () is a 1955 Soviet comedy movie directed by Yan Frid.Биография Клары ЛучкоДВЕНАДЦАТАЯ НОЧЬ (1955) It stars Klara Luchko, Alla Larionova, and Vadim Medvedev. == Actors == * Klara Luchko as Viola/Sebastian * Alla Larionova as Olivia * Vadim Medvedev as Duke Orsino * Mikhail Yanshin as Sir Toby Belch * Georgi Vitsin as Sir Andrew Aguecheek * Vasili Merkuryev as Malvolio == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1955 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Twelfth Night (1955 movie)
